text: 4:20 1 Jon 2:4; 3:17; 4:12Gumazitam o amizitam Godɨn ganizir puvatɨ. Gumazitam o amizitam Godɨn borir a garir igharazibagh ifueghan koghɨva, egh a manmaghɨn Godɨn a ganizir puvatɨzim gifuegham? Puvatɨ. An a gifueghan kogham. Ezɨ e kamaghɨn fo, gumazitam o amizitam suam, Kɨ God gifonge, egh Godɨn borir igharazibagh ifueghan koghtɨ, e fo, a ifari.
